what: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: imfweo R package access analyze International Monetary Fund’s World Economic Outlook (WEO) publications. WEO provides comprehensive analysis forecasts global economy published twice year - typically April October. package designed work seamlessly World Bank’s International Debt Statistics (IDS) World Development Indicators (WDI) provided wbids wbwdi package, respectively. follows principles econdataverse. package product Teal Insights sponsored affiliated IMF way, except use WEO data.

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: can install development version imfweo GitHub :

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data
text: main function weo_get() provides simple interface download data latest World Economic Outlook (WEO) publication: Note: first run R session, function may take seconds execute package checks WEO publication currently latest. information put cache, reset whenever session restarts. explicitly retrieve recent publication metadata, use: fetch data specific publication, filter country, indicator, time range, can use available parameters: Even filtering, full dataset selected publication must downloaded, WEO data distributed Excel format. explore available publications: list available entities (countries country groups) latest publication: list available data series:
code: library(imfweo)  weo_get() #> # A tibble: 353,544 × 7 #>    entity_name entity_id series_name             units     series_id  year value #>    <chr>       <chr>     <chr>                   <chr>     <chr>     <int> <dbl> #>  1 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1980 -56.3 #>  2 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1981 -82.2 #>  3 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1982 -91.8 #>  4 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1983 -76.0 #>  5 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1984 -67.9 #>  6 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1985 -63.5 #>  7 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1986 -66.4 #>  8 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1987 -63.5 #>  9 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1988 -57.3 #> 10 World       001       Current account balance U.S. dol… BCA        1989 -83.4 #> # ℹ 353,534 more rows weo_get_latest_publication() #> $year #> [1] 2025 #>  #> $release #> [1] "Spring" weo_get(   entities = c("USA", "GBR", "DEU"),   series = "NGDP_RPCH",   start_year = 2015,   end_year = 2020,   year = 2023,   release = "Spring" ) #> # A tibble: 792 × 7 #>    entity_name    entity_id series_name             units series_id  year  value #>    <chr>          <chr>     <chr>                   <chr> <chr>     <int>  <dbl> #>  1 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2015  288.  #>  2 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2016  299.  #>  3 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2017  289.  #>  4 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2018  316.  #>  5 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2019  318.  #>  6 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2020  274.  #>  7 United Kingdom GBR       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2015 -149.  #>  8 United Kingdom GBR       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2016 -149.  #>  9 United Kingdom GBR       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2017  -96.9 #> 10 United Kingdom GBR       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2018 -117.  #> # ℹ 782 more rows weo_list_publications() #> # A tibble: 37 × 3 #>     year release month   #>    <int> <chr>   <chr>   #>  1  2007 Spring  April   #>  2  2007 Fall    October #>  3  2008 Spring  April   #>  4  2008 Fall    October #>  5  2009 Spring  April   #>  6  2009 Fall    October #>  7  2010 Spring  April   #>  8  2010 Fall    October #>  9  2011 Spring  April   #> 10  2011 Fall    October #> # ℹ 27 more rows weo_get_entities() #> # A tibble: 209 × 2 #>    entity_id entity_name         #>    <chr>     <chr>               #>  1 510       ASEAN-5             #>  2 110       Advanced economies  #>  3 AFG       Afghanistan         #>  4 ALB       Albania             #>  5 DZA       Algeria             #>  6 AND       Andorra             #>  7 AGO       Angola              #>  8 ATG       Antigua and Barbuda #>  9 ARG       Argentina           #> 10 ARM       Armenia             #> # ℹ 199 more rows weo_get_series() #> # A tibble: 150 × 3 #>    series_id series_name                   units          #>    <chr>     <chr>                         <chr>          #>  1 BCA       Current account balance       U.S. dollars   #>  2 BCA_NGDPD Current account balance       Percent of GDP #>  3 BF        Financial account balance     U.S. dollars   #>  4 BFD       Direct investment, net        U.S. dollars   #>  5 BFF       Financial derivatives, net    U.S. dollars   #>  6 BFO       Other investment, net         U.S. dollars   #>  7 BFP       Portfolio investment, net     U.S. dollars   #>  8 BFRA      Change in reserves            U.S. dollars   #>  9 BM        Imports of goods and services U.S. dollars   #> 10 BX        Exports of goods and services U.S. dollars   #> # ℹ 140 more rows

title: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data

Fork repository: Fork repository GitHub account. Create branch: Create branch changes descriptive name. Make changes: Implement bug fix feature. Test changes: Run tests ensure changes don’t break existing functionality. Submit pull request: Push changes fork submit pull request main repository.

what: imfweo: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data — imfweo-package
title: imfweo: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data — imfweo-package
text: Provides tools download, process, analyze data International Monetary Fund's World Economic Outlook (WEO) database. Functions support downloading complete WEO releases, accessing specific economic indicators selected countries, listing available data.

title: imfweo: Download and Tidy IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) Data — imfweo-package
text: Maintainer: Teal Emery lte@tealinsights.com Authors: Christoph Scheuch christoph@tidy-intelligence.com (ORCID) contributors: Teal Insights [copyright holder]

title: Reset the Cache — weo_cache_reset
text: Reset Cache

title: Get WEO Data — weo_get
text: Retrieve data IMF World Economic Outlook (WEO) database specific series, countries, years.

title: Get WEO Data — weo_get
code: weo_get(   entities = NULL,   series = NULL,   start_year = 1980L,   end_year = NULL,   year = NULL,   release = NULL,   quiet = TRUE )

title: Get WEO Data — weo_get
text: entities optional character vector ISO3 country codes country group identifiers. See weo_get_entities. series optional character vector series codes. See weo_get_series. start_year Minimum year include. Defaults 1980. end_year Maximum year include. Defaults current year + 5 years. year year WEO publication (e.g., 2024). Defaults latest publication year. release release WEO publication ("Spring" "Fall"). Defaults latest publication release. quiet description

title: Get WEO Data — weo_get
text: data frame columns: entity_id ISO3 country code country group ID entity_name Entity name series_code WEO series code series_name Series name units Units measurement year Year value Value

title: Get WEO Data — weo_get
code: # \donttest{ # Get GDP growth for selected countries weo_get(   entities = c("USA", "GBR", "DEU"),   series = "NGDP_RPCH",   start_year = 2015,   end_year = 2020 ) #> # A tibble: 792 × 7 #>    entity_name    entity_id series_name             units series_id  year  value #>    <chr>          <chr>     <chr>                   <chr> <chr>     <int>  <dbl> #>  1 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2015  278.  #>  2 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2016  315.  #>  3 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2017  303.  #>  4 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2018  342.  #>  5 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2019  312.  #>  6 Germany        DEU       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2020  249.  #>  7 United Kingdom GBR       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2015 -145.  #>  8 United Kingdom GBR       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2016 -147.  #>  9 United Kingdom GBR       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2017  -93.7 #> 10 United Kingdom GBR       Current account balance U.S.… BCA        2018 -113.  #> # ℹ 782 more rows # }

title: Get Available WEO Entities — weo_get_entities
text: Returns data frame available entities (countries country groups) WEO database.

title: Get Available WEO Entities — weo_get_entities
code: weo_get_entities(year = NULL, release = NULL, quiet = TRUE)

title: Get Available WEO Entities — weo_get_entities
text: year year WEO publication (e.g., 2024). Defaults latest publication year. release release WEO publication ("Spring" "Fall"). Defaults latest publication release. quiet logical indicating whether print download information. Defaults TRUE.

title: Get Available WEO Entities — weo_get_entities
text: data frame columns: entity_id ISO3 country code country group ID entity_name Full name country country group

title: Get Available WEO Entities — weo_get_entities
code: # \donttest{ # List all countries and regions weo_get_entities() #> # A tibble: 209 × 2 #>    entity_id entity_name         #>    <chr>     <chr>               #>  1 510       ASEAN-5             #>  2 110       Advanced economies  #>  3 AFG       Afghanistan         #>  4 ALB       Albania             #>  5 DZA       Algeria             #>  6 AND       Andorra             #>  7 AGO       Angola              #>  8 ATG       Antigua and Barbuda #>  9 ARG       Argentina           #> 10 ARM       Armenia             #> # ℹ 199 more rows # }

what: Get Latest WEO Publication from IMF Website — weo_get_latest_publication
title: Get Latest WEO Publication from IMF Website — weo_get_latest_publication
text: Determines latest available WEO publication based current date.

title: Get Latest WEO Publication from IMF Website — weo_get_latest_publication
Get Latest WEO Publication from IMF Website — weo_get_latest_publication
text: quiet logical indicating whether print download information. Defaults TRUE.

title: Get Latest WEO Publication from IMF Website — weo_get_latest_publication
text: list year release

title: Get Latest WEO Publication from IMF Website — weo_get_latest_publication
Get Available WEO Series — weo_get_series
text: Returns data frame available series WEO database.

title: Get Available WEO Series — weo_get_series
code: weo_get_series(year = NULL, release = NULL, quiet = TRUE)

title: Get Available WEO Series — weo_get_series
text: year year WEO publication (e.g., 2024). Defaults latest publication year. release release WEO publication ("Spring" "Fall"). Defaults latest publication release. quiet logical indicating whether print download information. Defaults TRUE.

title: Get Available WEO Series — weo_get_series
text: data frame columns: series_id WEO series ID (e.g., "NGDP_RPCH") series_name Full name series (e.g., "Gross domestic product, constant prices") units Units measurement

title: Get Available WEO Series — weo_get_series
code: # \donttest{ # List all series weo_get_series() #> # A tibble: 150 × 3 #>    series_id series_name                   units          #>    <chr>     <chr>                         <chr>          #>  1 BCA       Current account balance       U.S. dollars   #>  2 BCA_NGDPD Current account balance       Percent of GDP #>  3 BF        Financial account balance     U.S. dollars   #>  4 BFD       Direct investment, net        U.S. dollars   #>  5 BFF       Financial derivatives, net    U.S. dollars   #>  6 BFO       Other investment, net         U.S. dollars   #>  7 BFP       Portfolio investment, net     U.S. dollars   #>  8 BFRA      Change in reserves            U.S. dollars   #>  9 BM        Imports of goods and services U.S. dollars   #> 10 BX        Exports of goods and services U.S. dollars   #> # ℹ 140 more rows # }

what: List Available IMF WEO Publications — weo_list_publications
title: List Available IMF WEO Publications — weo_list_publications
text: Returns data frame available WEO publications 2007 onwards. IMF typically releases WEO database twice per year: Spring (April) Fall (October)

title: List Available IMF WEO Publications — weo_list_publications
code: weo_list_publications(   start_year = 2007,   end_year = as.integer(format(Sys.Date(), "%Y")),   check_latest = FALSE )

title: List Available IMF WEO Publications — weo_list_publications
text: start_year Minimum year include. Defaults 2007. end_year Maximum year include. Defaults current year. check_latest Logical indicating whether check whether latest publication according current date released. Defaults FALSE.

title: List Available IMF WEO Publications — weo_list_publications
text: data frame columns: year year release release release name ("Spring" "Fall") month month release ("April" "October")

title: List Available IMF WEO Publications — weo_list_publications
code: # \donttest{ weo_list_publications(check_latest = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 38 × 3 #>     year release month   #>    <int> <chr>   <chr>   #>  1  2007 Spring  April   #>  2  2007 Fall    October #>  3  2008 Spring  April   #>  4  2008 Fall    October #>  5  2009 Spring  April   #>  6  2009 Fall    October #>  7  2010 Spring  April   #>  8  2010 Fall    October #>  9  2011 Spring  April   #> 10  2011 Fall    October #> # ℹ 28 more rows # }

title: imfweo (development version)
text: Initial CRAN submission weo_get(), weo_get_series(), weo_entities(), weo_latest_publication(), weo_list_publications()
